name: TIMELINE: Genesis video game
blurb: To make a platform game taking place in a physic / bible -based world: a cuckoo clock! This game version will be all about the Genesis!

rewards.reward: get the complete TIMELINE GENESIS game before it is officially released to everyone!!! Thats biblical history in the making!

get the complete TIMELINE GENESIS game before it is officially released to everyone AND the "Making of" journal. See how this game is based on years of experimenting/reiterations and combos of earlier concepts. The notes are a little hard to understand in some areas as its written at all times in the morning/night/etc but they hopefully add inspiration your own creative process

TIMELINE GENESIS game before officially released, "Making of" journal, and 2 Hour Training video before released! As a certified 3ds max 2012 PROFESSIONAL I made a tutorial of video game prototyping using TIMELINE: Genesis as the game! Before trying to sell the tutorial I decided to officially tie it into a pledge here- so this is NOT available in stores/anywhere! It will have a few animals (based on Noahs ark level) and some concepts that can help your own game ideas like a visual journal/learning aid. Although the game concept keeps getting refined (and will even after posting as I've added a "cross" feature not in video) the animals are the core basis in this intermediate video.

TIMELINE GENESIS game before officially released, 2 Hour Training video on disc before released ( by the way for the patient ones Ive uploaded a 16 mb training video preview...yesss takes time http://www.verseability.com/cuuc002.mp4) and your name in game credits! In addition to rewards from before your name will be in bright lights/in the game itself!!!

TIMELINE GENESIS game before officially released, 2 Hour Training video before released, and a photo of your face in bonus level storyboard! Your mug (ok not a "mug" as a "cup") but your face scanned/digitally inside a level!

TIMELINE GENESIS game before officially released, 2 Hour Training video before released, your name (and girl/boy/friend name in game credits), and 2 photos (you and your friends face and your names) in 2 storyboards in bonus level.\r\nOk this is similar to previous pledge (just doubled) but the next one is radically different......

Wow. OK this one gets you the TIMELINE GENESIS game before officially released AND ....drumroll...a physical, real world wearable:\r\nVerseAbility BIBLICAL WRISTWATCH! This is a watch that has the complete kjv bible on it (and e-reader/ 2 gb card for putting your own books on) as well as a picture viewer, mp3 player, sound recorder, and more. It even makes calls (using your own simcard where available) and comes with a biblical imprinted text right on the wristband (unless you specify "no imprint") AND to top that off, I will put the "Making Of" Journal directly on this watch as well!!!! So you can view game info on the go!!!
TIMELINE GENESIS game before officially released, VerseAbility BIBLICAL WRISTWATCH\r\n(with "Making Of" Journal on the watch) and your photo and name in bonus level storyboard!

TIMELINE GENESIS game before officially released, VerseAbility BIBLICAL WRISTWATCH (with "Making Of" Journal on the watch), your photo in bonus level storyboard, 2 Hour training video, and VerseAbility T-shirt. I'm no fashion guru but these are "exclusive" and not sold in department stores.

Finishing up rewards here at #10 comes:\r\nTIMELINE GENESIS game before officially released, VerseAbility BIBLICAL WRISTWATCH (with "Making Of" Journal on the watch), your name (and 2 other names in game credits), 3 photos (you and your 2 friends face) in 3 storyboards in bonus level, 2 Hour training video, and VerseAbility T-shirt, and my signature. It could be worth you lots of money one day you can sell it on ebay!

TIMELINE GENESIS game before officially released, VerseAbility BIBLICAL WRISTWATCH (with "Making Of" Journal on the watch), your name (and 2 other names in game credits), 3 photos (you and your 2 friends face) in 3 storyboards in bonus level, 2 Hour training video,\r\nVerseability shirt, and rounding it off your own sketch/art of how you picture NOAH scanned into the game in the unlockable section!!

I don't think anyone will pledge this all at once, but I put it in there just in case. This will be for the game-goal celebration for people in the NYC area! If 2 people get this fun the game has reached its goal and there should be a party emphasizing it (NYC location so please be in the area). This will include life-time membership to all future desktop games ever made. Get in on the ground floor while it's just taking off...
